#summary How to create your first JW Player Open Ad Streamer RTMP test page
#sidebar TableOfContents

To create a JW Player test page that pulls the VAST data from the Open Video Ads demo server while serving the
video ads from the CDN used for all examples on this site, do the following:

  # [http://open-video-ads.googlecode.com/files/openvideoads.jwplayer.openadstreamer.bin.tar.gz Download] the JW Player Open Ad Streamer binaries (SWF)
  # Create a blank html page - the code examples below assume the blank page is created in the root directory of the downloaded plugin page (where `dist` is a subdirectory containing the swf files)
  # Add the following lines in the body of your HTML page. These lines create an instance of JW Player instructing it to load the Open Ad Streamer plugin and a configuration file (example.xml) that contains the config required by the Open Ad Streamer
{{{
<object id="ply" width="400" height="260" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" name="ply" data="../dist/4.5.swf">
<param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"/>
<param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"/>
<param name="flashvars" value="height=260&width=400&plugins=../dist/OpenAdStreamer.swf&config=example.xml"/>
</object>
}}}
  # Now create the configuration file "example.xml" (this example assumes you are creating that file in the same directory as your test page.
  # Place the following configuration data into "example.xml"
{{{
<config>
    <openadstreamer.title>
        RTMP Example 02a - Plays non-contiguously
    </openadstreamer.title>
    <openadstreamer.json>
        {
            "deliveryType": "streaming",
            "allowPlaylistControl": false,

            "shows": {
                "baseURL": "rtmp://ne7c0nwbit.rtmphost.com/videoplayer",
                "streams": [ { "file":"the-black-hole.mp4", "duration":"00:00:10" } ]
            },

            "debug": {
                "debugger": "firebug",
                "levels": "fatal",
            },

            "ads": {
                "playOnce": false,
                "server": {
                    "type": "OpenX",
                    "vastURL": "http://openx.bouncingminds.com/openx/www/delivery/fc.php",
                },
                "schedule": [
                    {
                        "zone": "1",
                        "position": "pre-roll"
                    }
                ]
            }
       }
   </openadstreamer.json>
</config>
}}}
